text:
The food was good – I had the Vegetarian Fried Rice with Lychee Iced Tea.
There was a 10-minute wait at lunch, so factor that in if you're going then.
The ambience was nice.

Been here more than 3 times.

Overall the food was acceptable.

Just that the waiting time will be slightly longer during peak, approximately between  10-15 minutes.

It's a Vietnamese Restaurant, so their coffee will be good.

We ordered the Pho soup with fried meat ball.  5/10
And
Bun noodle -  the shallots and nut were soft and stale.

Water was 50c which i detest.  Why shud food outlets charge for water in SG

2024.12
Tastes good though it took a little long time to get my Cà phê trứng ready.

Got here at 1pm in a weekday. The crowd was just starting to thin out and we got to pick our seats.

Chose 3 vegetarian dishes and had the lemongrass drink (was a but diluted).

Vegetarian summer roll was refreshing and went well with the accompanying chilli sauce.

Stir fried pho noodles were tasty and chewy. It's a good portion for two to share if you want to try different dishes.

Mango and papaya salad was the best among the three. Tasty and flavourful. It was well balanced.
